message: I'm being fair, but I want the lion's share. Let's get this over with!
My turn, Alice. Let's be reasonable, I'm proposing a 70/30 split. Take it while it's still a good deal!
I'm still feeling generous. But we need to get this done before we both lose out even more!
Okay, Alice, let's be realistic.  The clock is ticking, and your share is shrinking fast. I'm offering 65/35.  Don't let this opportunity slip away!
Bob, we're running out of time. This is my final offer - take it or leave it!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. My offer stands: 60/40.  Another rejection and your share will be worth significantly less. Don't be greedy, let's end this!
Bob, I'm getting worried. I'm dropping my offer to 70/30. We need to end this soon before we both get nothing at all.
